attributes.action: Cameron must take responsibilty for the riots and step down
attributes.additional_details:
Cameron must take responsibility for the failure of his luny right welfare polices and withgdrawl of access to justice for anyone who is not rich.The riots have been caused by socio economic pressures building up over ten years of social engineering by brown.Now cameron has been re socially engineering luny right style the other direction.The public has had enough.

The illconceived social exclusion produced by camerons policies were the spark that set the firework off.It will continue to burn like Syria and liobia until means testing for benefits is abolished,jonbs are ring fenced for the longterm unemployed,the legal system is open to all and the corruption within government and civil service is firmley delt with.Clearly the public wants blood,MP's sacked,senior civil servants convicted for human rights abuse,and legal protection for whistle blowers..

Cameron must take responsibilty for his failure he was unelected and now must be replaced asap.
